name: agenth
description: AgentH - Autonomous goal tracking and task management with enforced workflow
author: AgentH Team

commands.name: next
commands.description: Shows the next task from active goals (does not start timer)

commands.name: do
commands.description: Starts the timer for the current task

commands.name: done
commands.description: Completes current task: stops timer, commits to git, tags milestones

commands.name: add-goal
commands.description: Creates a new goal with milestones (required for all planning)

commands.name: journal
commands.description: Add a journal entry with auto-commit

commands.name: status
commands.description: Show current timer status, active task, and progress

commands.name: track
commands.description: Start lightweight block tracking for ad-hoc work (no goal needed)

commands.name: shelve-goal
commands.description: Pause/shelve a goal to remove it from active task selection

commands.name: unshelve-goal
commands.description: Resume a shelved/paused goal and add it back to active task selection

commands.name: add-intent
commands.description: The goal ID to add an intent for (e.g., goal-001)
